annotations.description: Template for building and deploying simple one-app shiny apps using open source r and open source shiny
Defines how to build the application
Keeps track of changes in the application image

parameters.name: NAME
parameters.description: The name assigned to all of the frontend objects defined in this template.

parameters.name: SOURCE_REPOSITORY_URL
parameters.description: The URL of the repository with your application source code.

parameters.name: SOURCE_REPOSITORY_REF
parameters.description: Set this to a branch name, tag or other ref of your repository if you are not using the default branch.

parameters.name: GITHUB_WEBHOOK_SECRET
parameters.description: A secret string used to configure the GitHub webhook.

parameters.name: GENERIC_WEBHOOK_SECRET
parameters.description: A secret string used to configure the Generic webhook.

parameters.name: DOCUMENT_VOLUME_CAPACITY
parameters.description: Volume space available for Document uploads, e.g. 512Mi, 2Gi.

parameters.name: MEMORY_LIMIT
parameters.description: Maximum amount of memory the container can use.

parameters.name: R_PACKAGES
parameters.description: R Packages that need to be installed from CRAN. Separated by spaces, eg: datasets ggplot2

parameters.name: SYS_LIBRARIES
parameters.description: System libraries that need to be installed as dependencies for R Packages. Separated by a space, eg: libproj-dev libgdal-dev libgeos-dev

parameters.name: R_GH_PACKAGES
parameters.description: R Packages to be installed from GitHub. Unquoted strings separated by a space: (gh_user/repo@commit_SHA  gh_org/repo@release_tag) , the SHA/release tag is optional but recommended. eg: ropensci/plotly@a1613b3e225 tidyverse/ggplot2@v2.2.1

parameters.name: BUILD_MEMORY
parameters.description: Amount of memory available to build the container.
